For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252552. This 2021 Mazda CX-5 2.0 Active Auto comes with a balance of a 3 Year unlimited KM warranty and service plan. Vehicle has very low mileage. The all new Mazda CX-5 2. 0 Active Auto is the ideal car for big SUV lovers and is very family friendly. It brings a comfortable luxurious driving experience. A dual-zone climate control, Apple CarPlay® and Android Auto™ to always stay connected inside your vehicle allowing you to navigate your way around the city, play your music and get social media notifications on the move. it has a very spacious boot. 

The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today on to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved.
T&Cs apply

This modern and stylish vehicle is an absolute pleasure to drive. It is only a year old, very low mileage and still in brand new condition. It has amazing comfort and tech features, a modern appearance, with unique European styling and a responsive and fuel efficient engine.
No other car out there looks like or drives like a Citroen, this is a stylish and unique vehicle.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.

For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. The all-new Honda Amaze trend comes with a standard 5 Years or 200 000km Warranty and 2 years/30 000km service plan. The word Amaze is suited to this vehicle due to its affordability and comfortable drive. It features Honda's front design with spotlights, which is quite unique and stylish in its own way. At the rear is a roof-mounted sharkfin antenna, and third, high-mounted brake light.

WhatsFuel consumption average: 5.6 l/100km
CO2 emissions average: 133g/km

Please contact us to arrange a Taylor-made deal to match your pocket, trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. Finance is available with all the major banks as we are an approved dealer.
